```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE)
library(plotly)
set.seed(661)
```

## My Plotly Plot

``` {r plot, echo=FALSE}
x <- floor(rnorm(50, 30, 10) + runif(50, -10, 5))
    y <- ceiling(x*2 + runif(50, -5, 15))
        z <- c(rep("On a sitcom", 25), rep("Not on a sitcom", 25))
        z <- factor(z, levels = c("On a sitcom", "Not on a sitcom"))

datathing <- data.frame(Age = x, Cool = y,
                        sitcom = z)

colors = c("purple", "black")

plot_ly(datathing, x = ~Age, 
        y = ~Cool, color = ~sitcom,
        colors = colors,
        mode="markers",
        type = "scatter")

```
